title: Keweenaw National Historical Park: Permits & Reservations
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Permits & Reservations              Permits & Reservations        A school group visits the Calumet Visitor Center. NPS Photo   Â     Reservations Reservations for school groups and other educational groups, should be made two weeks prior to your visit. Please call 906-483-3028, to make a reservation. There is no fee for this service.   Special Use Permits At least one month's notice along with an application and a non-refundable $50 fee is required for a Special Use Permit.  Commercial filming or photography permits within park owned facilities or on park owned property are arranged on an individual basis. Please call 906-483-3028 for more information.
